name: cloud-e2e-protractor
description: Cloud web application functional end-to-end test project

scripts.clean-build: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run build && protractor typeScript/protractor.conf.js && npm run generate-junit
scripts.clean-test: npm run clean-build && protractor typeScript/protractor.conf.js && npm run generate-junit
scripts.generate-junit: mkdirp reports/junit && cat reports/json/cucumber_report.json | node ./node_modules/cucumberjs-junitxml/bin/cucumber-junit > reports/junit/cucumber_report.xml
